  xiv. AUCHI POLY requires that the relevant number of 
‘O’ level credit passes should include Mathematics, 
English Language and Economics. xv. IMO -POLY 
accepts only Biology or Agricultural Science. Does not 
accept History and Literature in English as course 
requirements.  
xvi. IMO-POLY: For Marketing – Same as in 
Accountancy.  
xvii. BEN-POLY requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
including English Language and Mathematics and 
three (3) other subjects from Economics, Business  
Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in 
English, Commerce, History, Statistics,  
 Geography,  Government,  Agricultural  
Science/Biology.  
xviii. OZORO requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language not Literature in English or Oral 
English, Mathematics and three (3) other subjects 
from Economics, Business Methods, Principles of 
Account, Literature in English, Commerce, 
History/CRS, Statistics, Geography, Government, 
Agricultural Science/Biology.  
xix. FIDEIPOLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Economics and 
any two (2) of commerce, Business Methods, 
Bookkeeping, Accounts and Geography at not 
more than two (2) sittings, but does not accept 
Shorthand, Typewriting, History , Office Practice, 
and Literature in English.  
xx. FEDFISH-LAG requires ‘O’ level credit passes in  
English Language, Mathematics, 
Government/Geography, Economics/Commerce 
and any Social Science subject.  
xxi. IBD-POLY accepts Economics, Commerce,  
Government, History, Agricultural Science, 
Biology, Bookkeeping, Yoruba, CRS, and IS as 
individual subjects. Also accepts any of the listed 
‘O’ level course requirements as UTME subjects.  
  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
 
PROGRAMMES AVAILABLE AT THE NATIONAL DIPLOMA (ND) AND ENTRY REQUIREMENTS
